Author: The_Truth_Was_a_Cave
Text: You don't sound negative or rude! He's not an ED therapist, but he'd really good with the issues underlying my ED- just not always the technical things like how many cals I need.   I mostly just slightly annoyed because I'm shortish AFAB and he's a pretty tall guy and it's completely plausible that his TDEE is double mine.

Author: amorae
Text: This is not meant to come off negative or rude or anything, but is he like an ed-focused therapist? If not, might be something to look into. Therapy got way more productive for me when I made myself go that direction.  Also, I’m guessing they’re not really supposed to talk about their own past struggles, but there haaave been a few times when I’d rant about shit like eating multiple entire pizzas and she just looks at me like she’s holding back “bitch me too”
